alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued December 20 at 3:53AM EST until December 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Rough surf and a moderate risk of life threatening rip currents are expected at the beaches north of Sebastian Inlet today. * WHERE...Southern Brevard, Coastal Volusia and Northern Brevard Counties. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Breezy onshore winds will produce rough surf and life threatening rip currents.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County
